file_content.text: Jayterr = always available to exchange interesting + exciting data
Master Satele's mission = sounds exciting // You = go to Carrick Station now + share stories with Jayterr later?
Your group members = match Republic watch list databanks // You = interesting organics + exciting rumor subjects
You = match Republic watch list databanks // You = interesting organic + exciting rumor subject
What are people saying about me?
What kind of rumors?
Rumors = highly complimentary + thrilling
I'm no one important.
Databank facial recognition = one-hundred percent accurate
Didn't your programmer tell you it's not nice to gossip?
You're a nosy little thing.
Jayterr = programmed for information gathering + dissemination // Gossip = hobby
You = "notable person to watch" + qualified for priority transmission // Recorded message = commencing
This is Master Satele Shan of the Jedi Order, working in conjunction with the Republic's Emergency Response Corps.
If you are receiving this message, you have prior experience dealing with extreme threats. Your help is needed immediately on the Outer Rim.
Strike teams are converging at Carrick Station. Further details are available there.
She didn't want to reveal too much over an open channel. Must be a serious emergency.
This is clearly important.
That wasn't very informative. Is there more to the recording?
I need to know more.
Rumors = military crisis at Saleucami // Battle station + invaders = threatening planet
Do jobs like this pay well?
Republic Emergency Response Corps = well funded // You = earn good profit for participation
You = set course for Carrick Station + speak to Master Satele Shan // Jayterr = anticipating exciting future rumors about you
Jayterr = awaiting priority transmission // We = trade interesting data another time?
